AbstractGameScreen - Class in de.tum.cit.fop.maze
Abstract base class for game screens, implementing common functionality for rendering, screen management, and user input handling.
AbstractGameScreen(MazeRunnerGame, Texture, float) - Constructor for class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.AbstractGameScreen
Constructs an AbstractGameScreen with the specified game instance, background texture, and final score.
activateFogEffect() - Method in class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.TrapItem
Activates the fog effect, marking it as active and setting the start time.
Arrow - Class in de.tum.cit.fop.maze
Represents a navigational arrow that points to the nearest door in the maze.
Arrow() - Constructor for class de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Arrow
Constructs an Arrow object with default textures and initializes its position.
